title: Beacon node fails to stop on ^C interrupt
body:
# üêû Bug Report

### Description

After running beacon node for several hours and trying to stop it using ^C it fails to stop

example output:



### Has this worked before in a previous version?

have encountered it on several occasions before.

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

trying to reproduce now. will add details if i successfully reproduce easily


## üåç  Your Environment

**Operating System:**
    osx 10.15.3 
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**
Starting beacon node version=Prysm/Git commit: aeb6dc13ace4238415988e63460074a54d1c58d9. Built at: 2020-05-11T04:50:30+03:00

I've been able to reproduce it @rauljordan , I've tried investigating but I haven't been able to see the cause.

This issue has been automatically closed because there has been no response to our request for more information from the original author. With only the information that is currently in the issue, we don't have enough information to take action. Please reach out if you have or find the answers we need so that we can investigate further.
